definitions: A mythical animal typically represented as a horse with a single straight horn projecting from its forehead.
A heraldic representation of a unicorn, with a twisted horn, a deer's feet, a goat's beard, and a lion's tail.
A start-up company valued at more than a billion dollars, typically in the software or technology sector.
A carriage drawn by three horses, two abreast and one leader.
A team of three horses arranged with two abreast and one leading.
